mapinfo.detailsText:
Andes is a mountainous region with the warring factions starting dangerously close. A Trade Route with three Trading Post sites separates the teams. Four Inca settlements are on the far side of the map. Allying with all the Natives is potentially powerful.
 
 Balanced by Rikikipu for Treaty Patch: River removed, player positions improved, resource balance improved, trade route position altered slightly.
 
 Native Civs: Incas 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Observer UI by Aizamk

Four Inca settlements are on the far side of the map. Allying with all the Natives is potentially powerful.\n \n Balanced by Rikikipu for Treaty Patch: River removed, player positions improved, resource balance improved, trade route position altered slightly.
